title: USC Trojans college-style slab serif and script
content:
I am looking for USC Logo. Here is a couple images:

[Link1](http://web.archive.org/web/20150401173051/http:/graphics.fansonly.com/schools/usc/graphics/usc-05-hdr-trojans-logo.gif)  
 [Link2](http://web.archive.org/web/20150401173051/http:/graphics.fansonly.com/schools/usc/graphics/usc-05-title-m-baskbl.gif)

Also would like the script font [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20150401173051/http:/graphics.fansonly.com/schools/usc/graphics/usc-05-flash-logo.gif).

Thank you very much.
author: TommyTrojan

comments.content:
I believe this is the free font [Freshman](http://web.archive.org/web/20150401173051/http:/www.dafont.com/freshman.font).

- Lex
Thank you very much! Does anyone know the script one?

Here is another one of just the script text

[Link](http://web.archive.org/web/20150401173051/http:/wtf.myfonts.com/images/09/09808c2b38ce227f9aa823e1c494ba88.38776.jpeg)
